mapper.select: select stock_id stockId, stock_price price from v_stock_price_r where stock_id=#{stockId};

select stock_id, stock_name, price_change, price_change_percent, stock_price, trading_amount, trading_volumn, hand_volumn, total_amount from oltp.v_stock_info where 1=1
and price_change_percent is not null order by price_change_percent desc
and price_change_percent is not null order by price_change_percent
and price_change_percent is not null order by trading_volumn desc
limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};

select if(industry is null,'其他',industry) name, cnt, up, down, amt from t_sum_industry_d where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and trans_insttt = 1
select if(industry is null,'其他',industry) name, cnt, up, down, amt from t_sum_industry_d where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and protocol_insttt = 1
select if(industry is null,'其他',industry) name, cnt, up, down, amt from t_sum_industry_d where 1=1 and snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and (protocol_insttt is null or protocol_insttt='') and trans_insttt is null
order by cnt desc limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};

select if(area is null,'其他',area) name, cnt, up, down, amt from t_sum_area_d where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and trans_insttt = 1
select if(area is null,'其他',area) name, cnt, up, down, amt from t_sum_area_d where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and protocol_insttt = 1
select if(area is null,'其他',area) name, cnt, up, down, amt from t_sum_area_d where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and protocol_insttt is null and trans_insttt is null
order by cnt desc limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};

select broker name, sum(cnt) cnt, sum(up) up, sum(down) down
from t_sum_broker_d where 1=1
and snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and trans_insttt = 1
and snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and protocol_insttt = 1
group by name order by cnt desc limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};
select name, cnt, up, pe from t_sum_directionaladdition_d where transMethod = #{transMethod} limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};
select name, cnt, up, pe from t_sum_pre_list_d where transMethod = #{transMethod} limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};

select (@rowNum := @rowNum +1) as rowno, stock_id, date_format(price_date,'%Y%m%d')price_date, high_price, low_price, up_price, down_price, trading_volumn, trading_amount, color from v_stock_price_d,(select (@rowNum:=0)) numtab where stock_id=#{stockId} order by price_date desc;
select stock_id, show_month, high_price, low_price, up_price, down_price, color from v_stock_price_m where stock_id=#{stockId};
select stock_id, stock_price, trading_amount, trading_volumn, price_time from v_stock_price_r where stock_id=#{stockId};
select stock_id, stock_price, trading_amount, trading_volumn, price_time from v_stock_price_single_r where stock_id=#{stockId} order by price_time;
select stock_id, show_month_week, high_price, low_price, up_price, down_price, color from v_stock_price_w where stock_id=#{stockId};
select stock_id, show_year, high_price, low_price, up_price, down_price, color from v_stock_price_y where stock_id=#{stockId};

select tp.stock_id, tp.price_change, tp.price_change_percent, tp.stock_price, tp.trading_amount, tp.trading_volumn, tp.offer_time, tp.sale_price_5, tp.sale_price_4, tp.sale_price_3, tp.sale_price_2, tp.sale_price_1, tp.buy_price_1, tp.buy_price_2, tp.buy_price_3, tp.buy_price_4, tp.buy_price_5, tp.sale_cnt_5, tp.sale_cnt_4, tp.sale_cnt_3, tp.sale_cnt_2, tp.sale_cnt_1, tp.buy_cnt_1, tp.buy_cnt_2, tp.buy_cnt_3, tp.buy_cnt_4, tp.buy_cnt_5, td1.begin_price as today_begin_price, td2.end_price as ysd_end_price, max(td3.latest_price) as high_price, min(td3.latest_price) as low_price, max(td3.trading_volumn) as max_volumn, min(td3.trading_volumn) as min_volumn from oltp.`t_rl_snap_etl_stock_price` tp LEFT JOIN olap.`t_sum_stock_price_d` td1 on tp.`stock_id`= td1.`stock_id` and td1.`snapshot_day`=( select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') LEFT JOIN olap.`t_sum_stock_price_d` td2 on tp.`stock_id`= td2.`stock_id` and td2.`snapshot_day`=( select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day< CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') LEFT JOIN olap.`t_anlssd_stock_dtl` td3 on tp.`stock_id`= td3.`stock_id` and td3.`snapshot_day`=( select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') where tp.stock_id= #{stockId} group by tp.stock_id, tp.price_change, tp.price_change_percent, tp.stock_price, tp.trading_amount, tp.trading_volumn, tp.offer_time, tp.sale_price_5, tp.sale_price_4, tp.sale_price_3, tp.sale_price_2, tp.sale_price_1, tp.buy_price_1, tp.buy_price_2, tp.buy_price_3, tp.buy_price_4, tp.buy_price_5, tp.sale_cnt_5, tp.sale_cnt_4, tp.sale_cnt_3, tp.sale_cnt_2, tp.sale_cnt_1, tp.buy_cnt_1, tp.buy_cnt_2, tp.buy_cnt_3, tp.buy_cnt_4, tp.buy_cnt_5, td1.begin_price, td2.end_price limit 1;

select stock_id, max(latest_price) as high_price, min(latest_price) as low_price, max(trading_volumn) as max_volumn, min(trading_volumn) as min_volumn from olap.t_anlssd_stock_dtl where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and stock_id = #{stockId};

select stock_id, max(latest_price) as high_price, min(latest_price) as low_price, max(trading_volumn) as max_volumn, min(trading_volumn) as min_volumn from olap.t_anlssd_stock_dtl where snapshot_day = (select max(snapshot_day) from meta.t_mt_date_matrix where snapshot_day> date_add(CURRENT_DATE, interval -2 week)+ 0 AND snapshot_day<= CURRENT_DATE+ 0 and is_market_holiday_chn= '0') and stock_id = #{stockId};

select
distinct fund_name, CAST(fund_found_date AS UNSIGNED) fund_found_date, fund_manager from t_orgn_etl_fund where fund_name like '%新三板%' order by fund_found_date desc limit #{currentRecord},#{pageSize};
select idx_name, idx_cnt, idx_desc, idx_grp from oltp.t_rl_snap_sum_index where idx_grp = 'market';
select broker name, cnt cnt from olap.t_sum_broker_d where trans_insttt = '2' and protocol_insttt = '2' and broker = #{brokerName};

select stock_id, max(high_price) as high_price, min(low_price) as low_price, max(trading_volumn) as max_volumn, min(trading_volumn) as min_volumn from (select stock_id,high_price,low_price,trading_volumn from olap.v_stock_price_d where stock_id = #{stockId} order by price_date desc limit 0,#{days}) sour limit 0,1;

select max(concat(stock_name,' (',base.stock_id,')')) as stock_name, max(full_name) as full_name, max(english_name) as english_name, max(registered_address) as registered_address, max(legal) as legal, max(secretary) as secretary, max(capital) as capital, max(industry_name) as industry_name, max(list_date) as list_date, max(web) as web, max(exchange_id) as exchange_id, max(protocol_broker) as protocol_broker, max(case when rowno = 1 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_1, max(case when rowno = 2 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_2, max(case when rowno = 3 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_3, max(case when rowno = 4 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_4, max(case when rowno = 5 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_5, max(case when rowno = 6 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_6, max(case when rowno = 7 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_7, max(case when rowno = 8 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_8, max(case when rowno = 9 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_9, max(case when rowno = 10 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_10, max(case when rowno = 11 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_11, max(case when rowno = 12 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_12, max(case when rowno = 13 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_13, max(case when rowno = 14 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_14, max(case when rowno = 15 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_15, max(case when rowno = 16 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_16, max(case when rowno = 17 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_17, max(case when rowno = 18 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_18, max(case when rowno = 19 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_19, max(case when rowno = 20 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_20, max(case when rowno = 21 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_21, max(case when rowno = 22 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_22, max(case when rowno = 23 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_23, max(case when rowno = 24 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_24, max(case when rowno = 25 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_25, max(case when rowno = 26 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_26, max(case when rowno = 27 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_27, max(case when rowno = 28 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_28, max(case when rowno = 29 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_29, max(case when rowno = 30 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_30, max(case when rowno = 31 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_31, max(case when rowno = 32 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_32, max(case when rowno = 33 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_33, max(case when rowno = 34 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_34, max(case when rowno = 35 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_35, max(case when rowno = 36 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_36, max(case when rowno = 37 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_37, max(case when rowno = 38 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_38, max(case when rowno = 39 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_39, max(case when rowno = 40 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_40, max(case when rowno = 41 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_41, max(case when rowno = 42 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_42, max(case when rowno = 43 then maker_broker end) as maker_broker_43 from oltp.v_stock_info base left join (select stock_id,maker_broker,(@rowNum := @rowNum +1) as rowno from oltp.t_rl_snap_maker_broker_full,(select (@rowNum:=0)) numtab where stock_id = #{stockId}) m_broker on base.stock_id = m_broker.stock_id where base.stock_id = #{stockId} group by base.stock_id
